Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.Motor

  • Packages that use Motor 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.control  
    org.strongback.drive  
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of Motor in org.strongback.components

      Subinterfaces of Motor in org.strongback.components 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  LimitedMotor
      A Motor that is bounded by two Switch components at the extremes of it's range of motion.
      interface  TalonSRX
      A motor controlled by a Talon SRX with built-in current sensor, position (angle) sensor, and optional external limit switches wired into the SRX so that it can automatically stop the forward and reverse directions when the limit switches are triggered.
      Methods in org.strongback.components that return Motor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Motor Motor.compose(Motor motor1, Motor motor2)
      Create a new Motor instance that is actually composed of two other motors that will be controlled identically.
      static Motor Motor.compose(Motor motor1, Motor motor2, Motor motor3)
      Create a new Motor instance that is actually composed of three other motors that will be controlled identically.
      default Motor Motor.invert()
      Create a new motor that inverts this motor.
      static Motor Motor.invert(Motor motor)
      Create a new Motor instance that inverts the speed sent to and read from another motor.
      Motor Motor.setSpeed(double speed)
      Sets the speed of this Motor.
      Methods in org.strongback.components with parameters of type Motor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Motor Motor.compose(Motor motor1, Motor motor2)

      static Motor Motor.invert(Motor motor)

    • Uses of Motor in org.strongback.control

      Subinterfaces of Motor in org.strongback.control 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TalonController
      A hardware-based Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller that runs on the Talon SRX motor controller.
